prog: (Haskell)a038220 n k = a038220_tabl !! n !! ka038220_row n = a038220_tabl !! na038220_tabl = iterate (\row ->   zipWith (+) (map (* 3) (row ++ [0])) (map (* 2) ([0] ++ row))) [1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 26 2013-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 26 2013, Apr 02 2011
